00037 #ifndef EGS_GAUSSIAN_SHAPE_

00063 
00088 class EGS_GAUSSIAN_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_GaussianShape : public EGS_BaseShape {
00089 
00090 public:
00091 
00092     EGS_GaussianShape(EGS_BaseShape *Shape, EGS_Float sx, EGS_Float sy,
00093         EGS_Float sz, const string &Name="",EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00094         EGS_BaseShape(Name,f), shape(Shape), sig_x(sx), sig_y(sy), sig_z(sz) {
00095         if( shape ) {
00096             shape->ref(); otype = shape->getObjectType();
00097             otype += "with Gaussian ditribution";
00098             if( sig_x < 0 ) sig_x = -sig_x*0.4246609;
00099             if( sig_y < 0 ) sig_y = -sig_y*0.4246609;
00100             if( sig_z < 0 ) sig_z = -sig_z*0.4246609;
00101         } else otype = "Invalid GaussianShape";
00102     };
00103     ~EGS_GaussianShape() {
00104         EGS_Object::deleteObject(shape);
00105     };
00106     EGS_Vector getPoint(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00107         EGS_Vector v(shape->getPoint(rndm));
00108         if( sig_x > 0 ) v.x += sig_x*rndm->getGaussian();
00109         if( sig_y > 0 ) v.y += sig_y*rndm->getGaussian();
00110         if( sig_z > 0 ) v.z += sig_z*rndm->getGaussian();
00111         return v;
00112     };
00113     bool supportsDirectionMethod() const { return true; };
00114     void getPointSourceDirection(const EGS_Vector &Xo,
00115             EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm, EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &wt) {
00116         EGS_Vector xo = T ? Xo*(*T) : Xo;
00117         EGS_Vector x = getPoint(rndm);
00118         u = x - xo; EGS_Float d2i = 1/u.length2(), di = sqrt(d2i);
00119         u *= di; wt = 1; //wt = A*fabs(u.z)*d2i;
00120         if( T ) T->rotate(u);
00121     };
00122 
00123 protected:
00124 
00125     EGS_BaseShape  *shape;
00126     EGS_Float      sig_x, sig_y, sig_z;
00127 
00128 };
00129 
00130 #endif
